page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: The majority of houses are privately owned either as owner occupier or tenant.There are only two council houses,the police house and the roadmans house. The types of houses in our area consist of old stone built cottages,detached,semi-detached and terraced.The terraced houses are now mainly derelict. Houses are heated by coal fire, electric heating or gas central heating. As there is no mains gas supply,gas is stored in cylinders,propane gas.But electricity is probably used the most for heating. All houses are connected to the main supply for water and sewage.
